title: Teapot
marks: Signature, Date and Sticker on bottom, incised: [Jim / Connell/ 2004]
description: thin, vase-shaped body, flaring outward slightly and inward to small mouth; long, tapering spout; very tall twisted handle on top; small cover; red and black with carved curved forms on body
creditline: Gift of funds from GMAC-RFC in honor of Susan Lundgren, ADDACS volunteer
